LightningComponentBundle.description: A configurable datatable for Screen Flows. Supports any object, view/single/multi-select modes, inline editing, relationship field links, search filtering, and column sorting.

propertyType.name: T
propertyType.label: Object Type
propertyType.description: The Salesforce object type for the record collection

property.name: records
property.label: Records
property.description: Collection of records to display in the table

property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: Auto-populated by the editor from the selected object type.

property.name: fieldNames
property.label: Field API Names
property.description: Comma-separated field API names for columns

property.name: columnLabels
property.label: Custom Column Labels
property.description: Comma-separated custom labels to override Schema labels

property.name: editableFields
property.label: Editable Fields
property.description: Comma-separated field API names that allow inline editing

property.name: selectionMode
property.label: Selection Mode
property.description: View Only, Single Select, or Multi Select

property.name: enableInlineEdit
property.label: Enable Inline Editing
property.description: Allow editing cell values in View Only mode

property.name: visibleRows
property.label: Visible Rows
property.description: Number of rows visible before scrolling

property.name: showSearch
property.label: Show Search
property.description: Display a search box to filter table rows

property.name: headerText
property.label: Header Text
property.description: Optional heading displayed above the table

property.name: headerFontSize
property.label: Header Font Size (px)
property.description: Font size for column headers in pixels. Defaults to 12.

property.name: rowFontSize
property.label: Row Font Size (px)
property.description: Font size for data rows in pixels. Defaults to 13.
